original: bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //

analyzed: de rnam pa de kho na nyid ni spros pa la sogs pa ste /
translated: Its aspect is just that, the elaboration and so forth.üîΩThe one who arises from that, together with the goddesses of awareness, is the person, the transcendent lords who are the essence of the mantra body.

original: de las 'byung ba gang zhig rig ma lha mo rnams dang bcas pa'i skyes bu ni sngags kyi sku'i ngo bo'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams le'u gang la de ni de bzhin no //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni lnga dang / sngags ni dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyi gang zhig de kho na nyid ni don dam pa ste 'od gsal ba'o //

analyzed: gzhan gyi don bya ba ste de'i phyir le'u bcu gnyis pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /

analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Therefore, in order to teach the twelfth chapter, [the BhagavƒÅn] declares, ‚ÄúThen, ‚Äù and so on.

analyzed: rdo rje ni rdo rjes nye bar mtshon pa'i 'khor lo la sogs pa ste /

analyzed: de nyid rig pa 'dzin pa'i dngos grub 'grub pa'i phyir /

original: 'dzin pas na rdo rje 'dzin pa ste /
analyzed: 'dzin pas na rdo rje 'dzin pa ste /
translated: it is the vajra-holder.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: That is the creation stage.

original: rdo rje ni yan lag drug pa'i rnal 'byor te /
analyzed: rdo rje ni yan lag drug pa'i rnal 'byor te /
translated: The vajra is the yoga of the six-branched yoga.

original: de 'dzin pas na rdo rje 'dzin te rnal 'byor ro //
analyzed: de 'dzin pas na rdo rje 'dzin te rnal 'byor ro //
translated: Since that is held, it is the vajra-holder, which is the yoga.

original: rdo rje ni ye shes lnga ste de rnams 'dzin pas na rdo rje 'dzin te /
analyzed: rdo rje ni ye shes lnga ste de rnams 'dzin pas na rdo rje 'dzin te /
translated: The vajra is the five gnoses. Since those are held, it is the vajra-holder,

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o ;
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o ;
translated: which is the completion stage.

original: / ston pa ni 'khor lo'i rig pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams kyis gsal bas na ston pa'o //
analyzed: / ston pa ni 'khor lo'i rig pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams kyis gsal bas na ston pa'o //

original: spro ba'i rim pas 'gro ba sprul pas na bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: spro ba'i rim pas 'gro ba sprul pas na bskyed pa'o //
translated: The creation is the creation because migrating beings are emanated by the stage of emanation.

original: ye shes mchog ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa ste de rnams sgrub pa'am /
analyzed: ye shes mchog ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa ste de rnams sgrub pa'am /
translated: The supreme intuition is Vairochana, etc. , and he is the producer of those, or their generator.

original: skyed par mdzad @158b pas na ye shes mchog sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: skyed par mdzad @158b pas na ye shes mchog sgrub pa'o //
translated: Thus, he is the supreme intuition producer.

original: de lta bu'i bcom ldan 'das kyis dam tshig rdo rje gsum ni phyag rgya chen po yongs su gyur pa ste /
analyzed: de lta bu'i bcom ldan 'das kyis dam tshig rdo rje gsum ni phyag rgya chen po yongs su gyur pa ste /
translated: The pledge of the three vajras is the transformation of the great seal of the Bhagavat of that kind.

original: de'i de nyid ni snying po ste rdo rje gsung ni gsung kho na rdo rje ste /
analyzed: de'i de nyid ni snying po ste rdo rje gsung ni gsung kho na rdo rje ste /

original: gsal ba'i gsung bka' stsal te /
analyzed: gsal ba'i gsung bka' stsal te /
translated: He spoke the clear speech.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: This is the creation stage.

original: yang na rdo rje ni sa bon gsum ste /
analyzed: yang na rdo rje ni sa bon gsum ste /
translated: Alternatively, vajra is the three seed[-syllables].

original: de nyid zo chun 'khrul 'khor gyi rim pas 'jug pa dang / gnas pa dang ldang ba'i rim pas 'dzin pa ni rdo rje 'dzin no //
analyzed: de nyid zo chun 'khrul 'khor gyi rim pas 'jug pa dang / gnas pa dang ldang ba'i rim pas 'dzin pa ni rdo rje 'dzin no //
translated: Its retention by the process of entering, abiding, and rising through the process of the water-wheel is the vajra holder.

original: dkyil 'khor bzhi'i rim pas 'od zer gyi 'khor lo spro bas na ston pa'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor bzhi'i rim pas 'od zer gyi 'khor lo spro bas na ston pa'o //
translated: He is the teacher because he emits the wheel of light rays through the process of the four mandalas.

original: dmar po la sogs pa'i dbye bas srog dang rtsol ba ni sna'i rtse mor 'dzin pas na bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: dmar po la sogs pa'i dbye bas srog dang rtsol ba ni sna'i rtse mor 'dzin pas na bskyed pa'o //
translated: He is the generator because he generates the life-energy and exertion by the divisions of red, etc., through retention at the tip of the nose.

original: ye shes ni yi ge gsum gyi brjod par gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /
analyzed: ye shes ni yi ge gsum gyi brjod par gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /

original: de dag gi mchog ni ye shes lnga ste de grub pa ni thob par byed pas na ye shes mchog grub pa'o //
analyzed: de dag gi mchog ni ye shes lnga ste de grub pa ni thob par byed pas na ye shes mchog grub pa'o //

original: dam tshig rdo rje gsum de nyid de ma ning gi bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid dang / rdo rje gsung ste rdo rje bzlas pa bka' stsal pa ni gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig rdo rje gsum de nyid de ma ning gi bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid dang / rdo rje gsung ste rdo rje bzlas pa bka' stsal pa ni gsungs pa'o //
translated: The three vajra commitments are the reality of the neutral recitation, and the vajra speech is the vajra recitation.

original: de ni rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa'o //üîΩyang na rang bzhin rnam ston cing //
analyzed: de ni rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa'o // yang na rang bzhin rnam ston cing //
translated: This is the stage of vajra recitation.üîΩOr else, it is the teacher because it reveals the nature and

original: nye bar sdud pas na ston pa'o //
analyzed: nye bar sdud pas na ston pa'o //
translated: because it gathers.

original: rdo rje ni rnam par shes pa gsum ste /
analyzed: rdo rje ni rnam par shes pa gsum ste /
translated: The vajra is the three consciousnesses.

original: de rnams 'od gsal bar 'dzin cing 'dzud pas na rdo rje 'dzin no //
analyzed: de rnams 'od gsal bar 'dzin cing 'dzud pas na rdo rje 'dzin no //
translated: Since it holds and inserts them into clear light, it is the vajra holder.

original: zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi snang ba shes nas skyed cing gnas pas na skyed pa'o //
analyzed: zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi snang ba shes nas skyed cing gnas pas na skyed pa'o //
translated: Since it generates and abides by knowing the appearance of the light rays of the moon and sun, it is the generator.

original: ye shes mchog ni snang ba la sogs pa gsum ste /
analyzed: ye shes mchog ni snang ba la sogs pa gsum ste /
translated: The supreme gnosis is the three, the appearance and so forth.

original: de rnams sgrub cing mngon du mdzad pas na ye shes mchog sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams sgrub cing mngon du mdzad pas na ye shes mchog sgrub pa'o //
translated: Since he accomplishes and realizes those, he is the Accomplisher of Supreme Intuition.

original: rdo rje gsum ste ye shes gsum yang dag par zhugs shing thim pas na dam tshig ste 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum ste ye shes gsum yang dag par zhugs shing thim pas na dam tshig ste 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: Since the three vajras, i.e. the three intuitions, have entered and dissolved into the pledge, i.e. the clearlight transparency,

original: de ni de nyid de thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de ni de nyid de thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: that is the reality, the nature of universal voidness.

original: rdo rje gsung ste rdo rje tshig gis rtogs par bya ba'i don gyi mtshan nyid bka' stsal pa ni bshad pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gsung ste rdo rje tshig gis rtogs par bya ba'i don gyi mtshan nyid bka' stsal pa ni bshad pa'o //
translated: He has spoken, i.e. explained, the vajra speech, the vajra word, the nature of the meaning to be understood.

original: de ni sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pa'o//
analyzed: de ni sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pa'o//
translated: That is the stage of the pure mind.

original: yang na rdo rje ste sgyu ma lta bu'i sku 'dzin cing 'od gsal ba las spro bas na rdo rje 'dzin no //üîΩde nyid kyi phyir longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus gsung yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa'i sgo nas 'gro ba gsum la rjes su ston par mdzad pa nyid yin pas na ston pa'o //
analyzed: yang na rdo rje ste sgyu ma lta bu'i sku 'dzin cing 'od gsal ba las spro bas na rdo rje 'dzin no // de nyid kyi phyir longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus gsung yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa'i sgo nas 'gro ba gsum la rjes su ston par mdzad pa nyid yin pas na ston pa'o //
translated: Or else, he is the vajra holder, since he holds the vajra, i.e. the body which is like an illusion, and radiates from the clearlight transparency.üîΩAnd he is the teacher, since he is the very one who instructs the three worlds by means of the enjoyment body endowed with the sixty branches of speech.

original: sprul pa'i sku rnams kyis dkyil @159a * //
analyzed: sprul pa'i sku rnams kyis dkyil @159a * //
translated: The emanation bodies, by means of the emanation body, instruct the three worlds by means of the sixty branches of speech.

original: 'khor gyi 'khor lo gsar pa gzhan dang gzhan skyed par mdzad pas na skyed pa'o //
analyzed: 'khor gyi 'khor lo gsar pa gzhan dang gzhan skyed par mdzad pas na skyed pa'o //
translated: It is a producer because it produces other and other new circles of retinue.

original: ye shes mchog ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes las dus phyis 'byung ba'i sgyu ma dang smig rgyu la sogs pa'i rnam pa dag ste /
analyzed: ye shes mchog ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes las dus phyis 'byung ba'i sgyu ma dang smig rgyu la sogs pa'i rnam pa dag ste /
translated: The supreme intuition is the illusion, mirage, etc., which occur after the nondiscriminative intuition.

original: de rnams kyis bsgrub cing khams gsum pa la de dang mtshungs par gzigs pas na ye shes mchog sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyis bsgrub cing khams gsum pa la de dang mtshungs par gzigs pas na ye shes mchog sgrub pa'o //
translated: It is the supreme intuition because it is established by those and because it sees the three realms as similar to them.

original: rnam par mi rtog pa la 'jug pa las //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa la 'jug pa las //
translated: In the Avatiirabhii$ya on the Madhyiintavibhanga it says:

original: shes bya khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis ni chos thams cad nam mkha'i dkyil dang mtshungs par mthong ngo //
analyzed: shes bya khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis ni chos thams cad nam mkha'i dkyil dang mtshungs par mthong ngo //
translated: By the intuition which is superior to the object of knowledge, one sees all things as similar to the center of space.

original: de'i rjes la thob pas ni sgyu ma dang smig rgyu dang dri za'i grong khyer dang chu zla dang sgra brnyan dang rmi lam dang mtshungs par mthong ngo zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i rjes la thob pas ni sgyu ma dang smig rgyu dang dri za'i grong khyer dang chu zla dang sgra brnyan dang rmi lam dang mtshungs par mthong ngo zhes gsungs so //
translated: By the subsequent intuition, one sees them as similar to an illusion, a mirage, a castle in the sky, the reflection of the moon in water, an echo, and a dream.

original: rdo rje gsum ni chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku rnams so //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum ni chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku rnams so //
translated: The three vajras are the Dharma Body, the Enjoyment Body, and the Transformation Body.

original: de dag yang dag par 'dus pas na dam tshig ste gsum gyi rang bzhin can zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de dag yang dag par 'dus pas na dam tshig ste gsum gyi rang bzhin can zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The pledge is the gathering of those, i.e., the nature of the three vajras.üîΩThatness is the mere entity of those three bodies, which have the nature of illusion, etc.

original: de nyid ces bya ba la sgyu ma la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi sku gsum po de'i dngos po tsam ni de nyid de de'i rang bzhin no zhes gzhan dang ldan pa bcad pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba la sgyu ma la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi sku gsum po de'i dngos po tsam ni de nyid de de'i rang bzhin no zhes gzhan dang ldan pa bcad pa ste /
translated: The word ‚Äúonly‚Äù excludes anything else, i.e., it has that nature.

original: srid sgrub 'phong skyen zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: srid sgrub 'phong skyen zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: It is like the expression ‚ÄúArjuna is a great archer.‚Äù

original: rdo rje gsum 'di bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba 'di ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum 'di bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba 'di ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: This is the statement of the three vajras, as before.

original: de ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: de ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: That is the process of self-consecration.

original: yang na ston pa ste gang zhig 'dod chags dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'dod chags par ma'i rnam par rtog pa spangs pa'am 'degs par mdzad pa de ni ston pa'o //
analyzed: yang na ston pa ste gang zhig 'dod chags dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'dod chags par ma'i rnam par rtog pa spangs pa'am 'degs par mdzad pa de ni ston pa'o //
translated: Or else, the teacher is the one who teaches, who abandons or elevates the concepts of passion, absence of passion, and neutrality, or who is the one who is passionate, dispassionate, and neutral.

original: rdo rje ste de kho na nyid bzhi pa 'dzin cing mngon du mdzad pas na rdo rje 'dzin no //
analyzed: rdo rje ste de kho na nyid bzhi pa 'dzin cing mngon du mdzad pas na rdo rje 'dzin no //
translated: He is the vajra-holder because he holds and manifests the fourth reality, the vajra.

original: bskyed pa ste byang chub thob par mdzad pas na bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: bskyed pa ste byang chub thob par mdzad pas na bskyed pa'o //
translated: He is the producer because he produces, that is, causes the attainment of, enlightenment.

original: ye shes te 'byung bar 'gyur pa'i 'od gsal ba'i mchog ni sngon du 'byung ba'i smig rgyu la sogs pa lnga ste /
analyzed: ye shes te 'byung bar 'gyur pa'i 'od gsal ba'i mchog ni sngon du 'byung ba'i smig rgyu la sogs pa lnga ste /
translated: The supreme intuition is the five fore-occurrences, the mirage, etc., which are the light of the clear light that is to occur.

original: de dag sgrub cing nye bar mtshon par byed pas na ye shes mchog sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: de dag sgrub cing nye bar mtshon par byed pas na ye shes mchog sgrub pa'o //
translated: He is the producer of the supreme intuition because he accomplishes, that is, indicates, them.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje gsum ste 'dod chags la sogs pa rnams gcig tu bsdus pa ni rdo rje gsum ste mngon par byang chub pa'i de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje gsum ste 'dod chags la sogs pa rnams gcig tu bsdus pa ni rdo rje gsum ste mngon par byang chub pa'i de kho na nyid do //
translated: Similarly, the reality of manifest enlightenment is the vajra of the three vajras, which is the unity of passion, etc.

original: yang dag par 'dres shing mar la mar bzhag pa bzhin du thim pas na dam tshig go //
analyzed: yang dag par 'dres shing mar la mar bzhag pa bzhin du thim pas na dam tshig go //
translated: It is the commitment because it is the commitment, the perfect mixing, the dissolution like water in water.

original: de nyid kyi phyir te thams cad stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir te thams cad stong pa nyid do //
translated: It is that itself, that is, the emptiness of everything.

original: rdo rje @159b gsung ni sgras te thogs pa med pa'i gsung bka' stsal pa ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje @159b gsung ni sgras te thogs pa med pa'i gsung bka' stsal pa ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Vajra speech is sound. The statement is the explanation to come.

original: de ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: de ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: This is the stage of manifest enlightenment.

original: rnam pa dang bcas pa dang rnam pa med pa la sogs pa rnams tha dad pa dang gcig pa spangs par ston cing gzigs pas na ston pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa dang bcas pa dang rnam pa med pa la sogs pa rnams tha dad pa dang gcig pa spangs par ston cing gzigs pas na ston pa'o //
translated: The teacher is so called because he teaches and shows the avoidance of the differences and identity of the aspects and the non-aspects, etc.

original: rdo rje ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings te /
analyzed: rdo rje ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings te /
translated: Vajra is the realm of non-abiding nirvana.

original: de 'dzin pas na rdo rje 'dzin no //
analyzed: de 'dzin pas na rdo rje 'dzin no //
translated: He is the vajra-holder because he holds that.

original: chos thams cad sprul par mdzad pas skyed pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad sprul par mdzad pas skyed pa'o //
translated: He is the creator because he creates all phenomena as emanations.

original: ye shes lnga po de rnams kyi mchog ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te /
analyzed: ye shes lnga po de rnams kyi mchog ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te /
